title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Meet the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, model 2554A. It’s a vacuum and a mop in one simple machine. It cleans your hard floors and freshens area rugs without needing a separate mop and bucket.

Easy to use:
- Cordless convenience: no cord to trip over. The battery lasts up to 30 minutes.
- Light and steady: a carry handle helps you move it from room to room.
- Swivel head: turns easily around chairs, tables, and corners.

Cleans many floors:
- Works on tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, pressed wood, rubber floor mats, and area rugs.
- The brush rolls rotate to pick up dust, crumbs, and pet hair while washing the floor.

Keeps clean and dirty water separate:
- Two tanks: one tank holds clean water and formula (28 oz), the other holds dirty water (18.6 oz). Your floors are always cleaned with fresh water.

Neat features that help:
- Self-cleaning cycle: press a button and it cleans the brush roll for you.
- Improved edge cleaning: reaches along baseboards and room edges.
- Wi‑Fi with the BISSELL Connect app if you want tips and reminders, but it works fine without the app.

What’s in the box:
- 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
- 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
- 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Simple steps to start:
1) Fill the clean water tank with water and a little formula.
2) Press the power button. Choose hard floor or area rug.
3) Slowly move forward to wash and pick up dirt. Pull back to keep cleaning and drying.
4) When finished, empty the dirty water tank.
5) Run the self-clean cycle to keep it fresh.

Good to know:
- Cleaning path is 10.5 inches wide, so you cover more floor with each pass.
- Battery is a 36V Lithium-Ion for steady power.
- Buying BISSELL helps support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, which helps homeless pets.

If you want one machine that vacuums and washes at the same time, without a cord, this BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max makes floor care simpler and faster.
